channel.title: Item Help [317]
channel.description:
Lots of my class8 items are not equipping properly, for example, when equipping a death cape it appears in the inventory as a piece of paper or scroll, but when weilded it appears in the weapon section, and appearing as a little scroll following you when you move.
How would i fix this?

item.title: Item Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @puffypain puffypain
item.description:
@puffypain wrote:

Phaze One:

Your models or ints are messed up. Post the ints of the death cape and I might be able to help. Otherwise I would recommend downloading some working models.

What are “ints”? Sorry, new to the whole coding thing

Read full topic

item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:
